title: Boy_tilap
author: Boy_tilap
content: Any Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Answers from ChatGPT bot are enoughI asked ChatGPT on how to earn merit on BitcointalkIf you use Google Search, you can find many topics about it.Two topics you must read before asking more about how to earn meritMerit & new rank requirementsWelcome messageIf you can not do simple exercises like Searching, and always ask questions like this, you will not be able to gain merit.

comments.author: moneystery
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.Well, for now it's not too difficult to get merit but it's also not too easy, what you need to do is not only be active, but also have quality posts that are relevant to the topic being discussed. Wish you luck.

comments.author: Mr.corol
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.Welcome to the Bitcoin Forum. You must first post as per the form rules. Do not copy and post other people's posts. Merit is not earned by chasing merit. Always try to post quality. And always try to stay online..

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.To begin with, participate in the forum. You registered on the forum on 9 December, wrote one post on that day, and you haven't written any more until today. I don't know if you expect merits to fall from the sky when it rains or something. Participate every day by writing constructively and little by little you will earn merits.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.Rule no one of earning merit: never mention merit.  There isn't much to do just try to participate in discussions, share your ideas with others and if there are interested in what you shared your post might get merited, and another tip don't make post just because you want to earn merits because you'll get disappointed. Most times the post you think won't give you any merit end up with the  most merits, you know the forum is not a school that has a certain marking schemes that are used to access merit worthy post, it al depends on who is reading your post and how significant they find your post to be.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: All you need are:- Become useful- Only post when you have something interesting to say- Learn any bitcoin related areas that interest you.After that, merit will follow.

comments.author: MeCsc
comments.body: Quote from: fillippone on January 16, 2019, 07:07:32 PMIt’s all about the knowledge. Try to think about merits as a knowledge exchange: you give merit when you learn something new, you get merit when you teach something new, or you make other people think about something old in a new way. Once you progress in the knowledge you can start answering other users' question and solving their problems, or start contributing to  the forum providing new resources or tools, if you have the skills. Just try to figure out the best way to do so that suits your capabilities and resources.This is the best explanation of meritRead this as a guide for ranking up Ranking up is possible! 2900 Merits earned in less than 12 months!My 11 Hints!

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.You will earn merit by starting or participating in forum discussions. But before you start any discussion you should ensure that it will be beneficial to the forum community. Before responding to a post make sure you read the topic and other people's responses, if you have something different and helpful you can post it. You can also get information from other sources but ensure you reference them when you post them in the forum. Merits can be rewards for answering someone's question or adding to the person's knowledge. You can also get merits by joining competitions and doing a good job. Don't be desperate for merit, just be yourself, keep learning and enjoy the forum.

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Yes, here they are:- Do not think about merits. You will set yourself up for great disappoint, depression and even ban.- Think quality posts and top reply always. Make great posts or answer the queries of other users that show that you are willing to contribute positively to the growth of the forum.- Read forum rules: They are a lot of them but it wouldn't hurt going over them in your spare time. You may ask questions where you are confused.- Participate in the forum fully. There was just the pie contest that ended a couple of weeks ago.- Lastly, develop a thick skin for the harsh comments you may receive. QuotePlease help and advance thanks to all.I hope the above helps you as much as they have helped. You are welcome.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.Second post of yours and you asked about merit earning. I think the best way to earn it is be honest on your contribution and intention here. Also being a newbie means you need to study first everything you need to know here so that when you are engaging on some discussion you can ride with such technical discussion or response with confidence. Some merits could be gain and liked by others to those newbies who are showing persistence to learn.

comments.author: Arenga pinnata
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.always work hard, don't forget to continue to improve the quality of your posts, as a beginner I'm doing that right now.be consistent and not spam so that your btt account name will be lifted up, don't forget to be patient too, because sometimes we have tried our best but haven't gotten what we want, so with that stay patient if one day this comes to you.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Are you here to gain merits or to learn about bitcoins? You should be asking if there are any suggestions to help you a newbie gain more knowledge about bitcoins which is majorly what this forum is about, and not about just  asking about merits. Knowledge is more important than merits. Knowledge will follow you long after even if you decide to quit participating in this forum.If your interest here is just gaining merits, you already have the wrong priorities.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Hello, Newbie. I mean, you already know enough about how the forum is organized, since your first message is a question about merit. In addition to the merit section, you still need to take time to study the rules of the forum, otherwise you will be blocked before you receive your first merit.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?At first you r a new member and If I am not wrong you have a little idea about cryptocurrency and about this forum. If I am right you should not post for merit that is not a good work if you want to hunt merit when you don't contribute in this forum. First try to learn and contribute through the forum and help members as much as you can. Then you may earn a lot of merits. So first learn by yourself about crypto, Bitcoin, this forum and help others. Also you can post about scams in crypto then you may earn merits. Best of luck for you.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Yes, there's alot expected of you to offer on the forum and before you could achieve doing this, there are some requirements needed of you to have fulfilled which are:1. Being active on the forum2. Undergo a learning ground 3. Develop yourself about bitcoin and the forum4. Make quality posts with interesting contents 5. Be consistent in doing all the above items.Being a newbie, you're not expected to have chase after merits first but to develop yourself and get used to the forum by creating values, merits will later set in without you demanding for it base on what you're contributing with time.

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.Hello OP good day,Op when I visit your profile all I saw is that you've been registered on December  2022 which is 3 you are already 3 months old here in the forum but you have only 2 posts and now you are starting to post which is pretty good for newbies. And about your question about how to gain merits then all I can say is that merits will follow if you contributed well to this community. Jus keep moving forward and learn more things then achievements will be reach Soon. And before you doing anything don't forget to read and understand our forum rules in order to avoid mistakes .

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?How do you want to get merit when you only have a few posts and then ask about getting merit? It's a little weird.All you have to do is make interesting and unique posts and this can provide knowledge here or develop yourself what is a skill in bitcoin at least you understand it then you can ask about getting merit.Merit does not come alone, this is because of our skills in creating content if it is interesting people will be interested in you and give you the number of merits they want.Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMPlease help and advance thanks to all.Many suggestions have been given by several members here, all you have to do is study it.Never get bored, keep learning and developing your potential with the insights you have.

comments.author: Chilwell
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.This is home of knowledge, you are lucky to have found yourself here. Regarding your question about gaining of merit, at the beginning of my write up I said home of knowledge, to gain merit here is by contributing to the forum, make a post or reply that will benefit people in the forum. Please as a newbie go through this rules to avoid any ban from the forum.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.msg7955645#msg7955645

comments.author: Myleschetty
comments.body: Quote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Please help and advance thanks to all.I will advise you to be yourself, and understand the major concept of Bitcoin, the forum rules, and regulations. Find the area you are good at and make a good contribution within the board that's focused by merit source.Quote from: BlackBoss_ on March 24, 2023, 01:49:50 AMQuote from: Boy_tilap on March 24, 2023, 01:11:25 AMAny Suggestions to gain more merit?Answers from ChatGPT bot are enoughThe answer provided by the ChatGPT machine is accurate and I never think about asking the bot such type of question but the bot is still just a plagiarism tool.
